meeting_request.purpose: Need help with writing assignments and identifying a career path
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Denise, a junior majoring in Writing and Rhetoric. I’ve taken a lot of writing courses and done well in them, but lately my writing has been getting worse. I’m trying to write essays for grad school applications, but I keep getting stuck on the same issues. I also do a lot of academic writing, like reviewing books or summarizing articles, but I don’t see how what I’m doing is relevant to my major. I feel like I’m not even close to understanding what to do with my degree, and I’m having a hard time finding a career path that fits. I’m hoping to talk with someone about how to improve my writing and explore options for graduate school or other writing-related jobs.
